category: Click Boards > Display & LED > LED matrix
name: mikroe.click.c8x8b
short_description: 8x8 B click is a 64 LED matrix display Click boardâ„¢, composed of SMD LEDs organized in 8 rows by 8 columns. It has a digital brightness control in 16 steps, it can control every LED in the display matrix independently, it blanks the display on power up to eliminate glitches and it requires a single resistor to control the current through all the LEDs at once, which simplifies the design. 8x8 B click uses a fast SPI communication protocol, allowing fast display response and no lag.
